solution_line_template: If each call lasts an hour, the total amount of money charged is {minutes_per_hour}*{cost_per_minute} = $<<{minutes_per_hour}*{cost_per_minute}={cost_per_call}>>{cost_per_call} for 1 customer.

When she talks to {customers_per_week} clients in a week, the total amount of money charged is {customers_per_week}*{cost_per_call} = $<<{customers_per_week}*{cost_per_call}={weekly_bill}>>{weekly_bill}.
In a month of {weeks_per_month} weeks, the phone bill is {weekly_bill}*{weeks_per_month} = $<<{weekly_bill}*{weeks_per_month}={monthly_bill}>>{monthly_bill}.
